datasets.title: Economic Indicators
datasets.description: Global economic indicators including GDP, CPI, and more
datasets.details: Contains data for 50+ countries with quarterly and annual metrics from 2000-2024

datasets.title: Stock Market Data
datasets.description: Historical stock prices and market indices
datasets.details: Daily stock prices, volumes, and market indices for major global exchanges

datasets.title: Climate Data
datasets.details: Temperature, precipitation, and climate metrics from weather stations worldwide

examples.title: GDP Growth Comparison
examples.query: Compare the GDP growth rates of India, China, and the US over the last decade
examples.sql:
SELECT year, country, growth_rate
FROM economic_indicators
WHERE country IN ('India', 'China', 'US')
AND indicator_type = 'GDP'
AND year >= 2014
ORDER BY year, country

examples.title: Inflation Analysis
examples.query: Show me the correlation between inflation rate and unemployment in the Eurozone
examples.sql:
SELECT year, AVG(inflation_rate) as avg_inflation, AVG(unemployment_rate) as avg_unemployment
FROM economic_indicators
WHERE region = 'Eurozone'
AND year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2024
GROUP BY year
ORDER BY year
